description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows Layer-2 Bridge network driver denial of service vulnerability (CVE-2024-38105):

1. Download and apply the updates associated with the following KB articles based on your system version:
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2 for x64-based Systems: [KB5040442](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040442)
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2 for x64-based Systems: [KB5040427](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040427)
   - For Windows 10 Version 21H2 for both x64-based and 32-bit Systems: [KB5040431](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040431)
   - For Windows 10 for x64-based and 32-bit Systems: [KB5040448](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040448)

2. Restart your system after installation to ensure that the changes take effect.

**Details**:
- This fix addresses the improper input validation that could lead to a denial of service.
- Ensure your system corresponds to the built numbers listed to apply the correct updates: 10.0.22631.3880, 10.0.22621.3880, 10.0.19045.4651, etc.

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure the system is running a compatible version of Windows (Windows 10 or 11).
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
